Create livestock ownership table

Source: R/post_harvest.R
livestock_ownership.Rd

Create livestock ownership table

Usage

livestock_ownership(hhold_df, animal_var, cases, group_var)

Arguments

hhold_df

Data frame.

animal_var

Atomic character vector. Name of livestock ownership variable, as it appears in Designer.

cases

Data frame. Case to include in analysis

group_var

Atomic character vector. Name of the grouping variable

Value

gt table object
